content.p: Effective July 1, 2002, any individual occupying a position on a part-time basis that requires certification or graduation from a four (4) year college or university as a condition of employment and any individual providing part-time or substitute teaching services that are the same or similar to those teaching services provided by certified, full- time teachers shall be a member of the Kentucky Teachersâ€™ Retirement System, according to the conditions and only to the extent set forth in this section, if the individual is employed by one (1) of the public boards, institutions, or agencies set forth in , excluding those public boards, institutions, and agencies described in (4)(b) and (n). Members providing part-time and substitute services shall participate in the retirement system as follows:
